description: Claimed to be a respelling of the abbreviation airc for aircraftsman; or else from irk.

entries.meaning: (Britain, slang) A member of the groundcrew in the RAF.
examples: But I wasn’t accepted for flying duty—eyesight failed me. Neither was Frank, which, I’m ashamed to say, I found a relief. We were both channelled as aircrafthands, known to everyone as erks.
